text: visvasiccavare, ninnalute atimakalum ninnalile prayapurttiyettattavarum munnu pratyeka samayannalil anuvadam vanniyasesame ninnaluteyatuttu varan patullu. prabhata namaskarattinu mumpum uccayurakkin ninnal vastramaliccuvekkunna nerattum isa namaskarattinusesavumanat. itumunnum ninnalute svakarya samayannalan. marrusamayannalil anuvadamarayate ninnalute atuttuvarunnatil ninnalkkea avarkkea kurramilla. avar ninnale curripparrikkaliyunnavaranallea. ninnalan'yean'yam itakalarnn jivikkunnavaruman. ivvidham allahu ninnalkk avanre niyamannal vivariccutarunnu. allahu ellam ariyunnavanan. yuktimanum
